bento_grid.container: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-6 auto-rows-[minmax(180px,auto)] gap-6

items.hero: col-span-full lg:col-span-4 row-span-2 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-600 to-indigo-700 text-white p-8 relative overflow-hidden
items.stats: col-span-1 md:col-span-2 row-span-1 bg-white border border-slate-200 p-6 flex flex-col justify-between hover:border-blue-300 transition-colors
items.list: col-span-full md:col-span-2 lg:col-span-2 row-span-2 bg-white border border-slate-200 p-0 overflow-hidden flex flex-col

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium px-6 py-2.5 rounded-md shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 font-medium px-6 py-2.5 rounded-md shadow-sm transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-50 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-colors

cards.interactive: group cursor-pointer hover:border-blue-400 transition-colors bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl

tables.header: bg-slate-50 border-b border-slate-200 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500 h-12

inputs.default: h-11 border-slate-200 bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all rounded-md text-sm

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text-slate-500 is only used for labels, not main text.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Do not ask questions. Implement the design using standard React patterns and the provided Shadcn/Tailwind configuration.
instructions_to_main_agent.routing: Use 'react-router-dom' for navigation. Create a layout wrapper for the Dashboard that includes the Sidebar.
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use Context API or simple State for Hub/User management if Redux is not available. Mock API calls if backend is not ready.
instructions_to_main_agent.admin_flow: The 'Admin' user (default) must see a 'Solicitudes' or 'Usuarios' section to approve registrations. Pending users cannot login.
instructions_to_main_agent.responsiveness: Sidebar should become a Drawer/Sheet on mobile. Grid cols should collapse to 1 on mobile.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.do_not_center_app: Never center the entire app text. Use natural left alignment.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.typography: Use Manrope for all Headings (h1-h3). Use Inter for body.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.glass_morphism: Use sparingly on the Sidebar or Header, but keep main content solid for readability.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.shadows: Use layered shadows. Do not use flat borders only.
